about:
A highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a Master’s degree in Computer Science and over 3 years of experience in building robust software solutions. Proficient in a diverse range of technologies, including JavaScript frameworks such as React, React Native, Vue.js, Node.js, Express.js, and Nest.js, as well as Java-based technologies like Spring and Spring Boot.
 Coding since the age of 19, I have developed a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to create seamless and efficient applications.
 My passion for technology drives me to continuously learn and adapt to new tools and frameworks, ensuring that I stay at the forefront of industry trends.

education.degree: Bachelor of Life and Earth Sciences

projects.description: A web-based application designed to efficiently manage and track the fleet of vehicles, including cars and motorcycles, for a public company. Built using Laravel as the backend framework and MySQL as the database management system, the application provides a robust and scalable solution for managing vehicle-related operations
features: Maintenance Tracking(regular maintenance activities:oil changes, tire rotations, etc)
Maintain a history of maintenance records for each vehicle
Trip Management(Log trips taken by each vehicle, including start and end locations, distance traveled, and purpose of the trip)
Reporting and Analytics(Visualize data through charts and graphs)
technologies: Blade templating engine, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery

projects.description: Trip Management application built on Laravel and React Native is designed to streamline the planning, organization, and execution of travel itineraries for users
A comprehensive document management application designed specifically for public government companies to efficiently store, organize, and manage their order-related paperwork.
The Quran Karim app is a beautifully designed mobile application that allows users to read and explore the Quran and Hadith with ease and convenience
features: Ad'iya (supplications):A dedicated section for various Ad'iya, including daily supplications, special occasions, and prayers for specific needs
Customization Options(Users can adjust font sizes, styles)
